means: 护教学（基督教神学的一部分，研究教条的辨证）
（为事业、信仰等所作的）辩护（书）( apologetic的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: As we answer questions apologetics removes misunderstanding of the gospel.
sentence.Network_cn: 透过解答人所问的问题,消除人对福音的误解.

sentence.Network_en: Apologetics vindicates and justifies the Bible's worldview with adequate reasons and evidences.
sentence.Network_cn: 护教为《圣经》的世界观提出足够的支持理由.

sentence.Network_en: Implication of apologetics as preaching: we must not preach falsehoods.
sentence.Network_cn: 的涵义 ﹕ 我们必须讲真理,只讲真理.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 辨惑学- 辨惑学(Apologetics),亦称护教学。它作为一种基督教神学课题,指运用哲学、法学、逻辑和论辩术为基督教的信仰、教义和礼仪进行辩护。-bianhuoxue
捍卫和护教(apologetics),而在于探究"政治的物性"(the nature of political thin  gs),一如哲学的使职在于探究"物的物性"(the nature of things)本身。.
In Roman Catholicism , apologetics refers to the defense of the whole of Catholic teaching ., 在天主教中 , 辩惑学指的是辩护整个天主教的教义.

list.abs: at the beginning year , limited company of toy of rich Yang Jiayu ( next weighing abundant ) general manager Xia Zujun sent an apologetic letter through the network .今年初，富阳嘉裕玩具有限公司（下称“嘉裕”)总经理夏祖军通过网络发了一封道歉信。
say_百度百科 ... say aloud 大声地说 say apologetically 抱歉地说 say approximately 大概地说.
...基督教辨惑学（Christian apologetics，这个词来源于希腊语词汇ἀπολογία，意为“以言语辩护”），或称基督教护教学，是基督教神学的一个分支领域，主要是为了展现基督教信仰的理性基础，针对批评而进行辩护，并揭露其他类型世界观中可察觉的缺陷。cite_book |author=John M. Frame |title=Apologetics to the G.
不_互动百科 ... [feel apologetic;be sorry] 过意不去 [shudder with fear;tremble with fear] 不冷而发抖。指恐惧心理引起的惊抖.

means.word_mean: 1. the branch of theology that is concerned with the defense of Christian doctrines

auth_sentence.content: It comes up in apologetics, usually atheist apologetics.
